snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York named Steven Banks, a high ranking attorney at the Legal Aid Society who has frequently sued the Human Resources Administration, as its commissioner.
abstract: Attorney Steven Banks is appointed commissioner of New York City's Human Resources Administration, placing outspoken activist and litigator at center Mayor Bill de Blasio's left-leaning inner circle.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York named Steven Banks, a high ranking attorney at the Legal Aid Society who has frequently sued the Human Resources Administration, as its commissioner.

headline.main: Litigant Against Social Welfare Agency Will Be Its Leader
headline.print_headline: Litigant Against Social Welfare Agency Will Be Its Leader
